props.name: animateTarget
props.desc:
Id or element from which the dialog should animate while opening
(defaults to null with no animation)

props.name: autoCreate
props.desc: True to auto create from scratch, or using a DomHelper Object (defaults to false)

props.name: autoScroll
props.desc: True to allow the dialog body contents to overflow and display scrollbars (defaults to false)

props.name: autoTabs
props.desc: If true, all elements with class 'x-dlg-tab' will get automatically converted to tabs (defaults to false)

props.name: buttonAlign
props.desc: Valid values are "left," "center" and "right" (defaults to "right")

props.name: buttons
props.desc: Array of buttons

props.name: closable
props.desc: False to remove the built-in top-right corner close button (defaults to true)

props.name: collapsible
props.desc: False to remove the built-in top-right corner collapse button (defaults to true)

props.name: constraintoviewport
props.desc: True to keep the dialog constrained within the visible viewport boundaries (defaults to true)

props.name: draggable
props.desc: False to disable dragging of the dialog within the viewport (defaults to true)

props.name: fixedcenter
props.desc: True to ensure that anytime the dialog is shown or resized it gets centered (defaults to false)

props.name: height
props.desc: Height of the dialog in pixels (can also be set via CSS).  Determined by browser if unspecified.

props.name: minButtonWidth
props.desc: Minimum width of all dialog buttons (defaults to 75)

props.name: minHeight
props.desc: The minimum allowable height for a resizable dialog (defaults to 80)

props.name: minWidth
props.desc: The minimum allowable width for a resizable dialog (defaults to 200)

props.name: modal
props.desc: True to show the dialog modally, preventing user interaction with the rest of the page (defaults to false)

props.name: proxyDrag
props.desc:
True to drag a lightweight proxy element rather than the dialog itself, used when
draggable = true (defaults to false)

props.name: resizable
props.desc: False to disable manual dialog resizing (defaults to true)

props.name: resizeHandles
props.desc:
Which resize handles to display - see the {@link Roo.Resizable} handles config
property for valid values (defaults to 'all')

props.name: shadow
props.desc:
True or "sides" for the default effect, "frame" for 4-way shadow, and "drop" for bottom-right
shadow (defaults to false)

props.name: shadowOffset
props.desc: The number of pixels to offset the shadow if displayed (defaults to 5)

props.name: shim
props.desc: True to create an iframe shim that prevents selects from showing through (defaults to false)

props.name: syncHeightBeforeShow
props.desc: True to cause the dimensions to be recalculated before the dialog is shown (defaults to false)

props.name: tabTag
props.desc: The tag name of tab elements, used when autoTabs = true (defaults to 'div')

props.name: title
props.desc: Default text to display in the title bar (defaults to null)

props.name: width
props.desc: Width of the dialog in pixels (can also be set via CSS).  Determined by browser if unspecified.

props.name: x
props.desc: The default left page coordinate of the dialog (defaults to center screen)

props.name: y
props.desc: The default top page coordinate of the dialog (defaults to center screen)

events.name: beforehide
events.desc: Fires before this dialog is hidden.

events.name: beforeshow
events.desc: Fires before this dialog is shown.

events.name: hide
events.desc: Fires when this dialog is hidden.

events.name: keydown
events.desc: Fires when a key is pressed

events.name: move
events.desc: Fires when this dialog is moved by the user.

events.name: resize
events.desc: Fires when this dialog is resized by the user.

events.name: show
events.desc: Fires when this dialog is shown.
